styles.linkTooltip: ${__cell_1} in ${__cell_2}, introduced by ${__cell_3}: Click for root cause
${__cell_1} in ${__cell_2}, introduced by ${__cell_3}: Click for root cause

panels.content:
<script>

function hide(name) {
  var element = document.getElementsByClassName(name);
  
  if ((element) && (element.length == 1)) {
    element[0].style.display = 'none';
  }

}

function hideButtons() {
  hide("btn navbar-button gf-timepicker-nav-btn");
  hide("navbar-buttons navbar-buttons--zoom");
}

hideButtons();

</script>
